name: Phased Modules
desc: This hull has linked its own phase arrays with its modules' own, managing to phase both ship and add-ons in sync.

name: No AI
desc: The subsystems and actuators of this element have been set to dormant. They will not respond unless instructed from an outside command.

name: Civilian Conversion
desc:
Removes many military-grade subsystems and equipment to reduce supply consumption by half. This %s sensor profile and strength, %s and %s flux stats.
Does not make the ship a civilian-hull for other bonuses, as this is a conversion.
short: Makes ship cheaper to maintain but worsens stats.
sModDesc: Removes the flux and burn penalties.

name: Disabled Shipsystem
desc: Makes the ship unable to use its system. This cheapens maintenance.

name: Chopped and Cooked
desc:
Special modifications on this ship reduce ballistic weapon damage to a %s of their original value but double their rate of fire.
These modifications also increase energy weapon damage by %s but halve their rate of fire.
short: Decreases ballistic damage but increases RoF. Increases energy damage but decreases RoF.
